Question: Raycon Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Raycon Inc.

Everyday Pro Series

- Everyday Earbuds Pro and Everyday Headphones Pro
- Priced at $149, available in white, black, or blue
- Everyday Earbuds Pro: small stem design, active noise cancellation, Bluetooth Multipoint, six-mic array, 10 hours playtime per charge, 40 hours with case, wireless/USB-C charging
- Everyday Headphones Pro: single pivot connection, up to 60 hours battery life with ANC off, Bluetooth Multipoint, voice assistant compatibility
- Glass-clear voice calls, IPX4 water resistance, comfortable fit, Siri and Amazon Alexa compatibility, Multipoint Connection
- Available at the end of January 2024
Summary_cn:
Raycon公司。

每日Pro系列

- 每日耳塞Pro和每日耳机Pro
- 售价149美元，有白色、黑色或蓝色可供选择
- 每日耳塞Pro：小型杆设计，主动降噪，蓝牙多点连接，六麦克风阵列，每次充电10小时播放时间，配备充电盒可提供40小时播放时间，支持无线/USB-C充电
- 每日耳机Pro：单轴连接，关闭主动降噪状态下可达60小时的电池续航时间，蓝牙多点连接，语音助手兼容性
- 晶莹澄澈的语音通话，IPX4级防水性能，舒适的佩戴感，支持Siri和Amazon Alexa，多点连接
- 将于2024年1月底上市
